Example: Site verified and sitemap submitted in Bing Webmaster Tools

Item: ChatGPT: OAI-SearchBot crawling confirmed in server logs
Example: Log entries showing OAI-SearchBot user agent accessing key pages

Item: ChatGPT: Key pages force-fetched via prompt
Example: Ask ChatGPT: "Search [url] and summarize" for each critical page
If ChatGPT cites URL with utm_source=openai the cache is from Bing not fresh

Item: ChatGPT: Cache-busting used after content updates
Example: Append ?v=new to URLs and re-fetch after major content changes
Site verified with all sitemaps submitted

Item: Gemini: E-E-A-T signals strong across site
Example: Author bios; about page; credentials; external validation present

Item: Gemini: Grounding Blocks on key pages (HTML tables with stats)
Example: <table> elements with numerical data that Gemini can ground against

Item: Gemini: Top 10 Google ranking for entity queries
Example: Brand name + category query ranks on page 1 of Google

Item: Gemini: Statistics with verifiable sources on key pages
Perplexity: Top Google results for target queries
Example: Key pages rank well in Google (Perplexity pulls from top results)
Clear factual statements that are easy to cite with source attribution
Key pages appear in Brave Search results for target queries

Item: All LLMs: Force-fetch each updated page individually (per-page not site-wide)
Example: After updating /pricing; specifically prompt each LLM to read that URL

Item: All LLMs: Seeding prompts used after major launches
Example: Ask each LLM about your brand after content updates to prime the cache

Item: All LLMs: Branded query returns accurate information
Example: Ask "What is [Brand]?" on each LLM and verify accuracy

Item: All LLMs: Non-branded discovery queries tested
Example: Ask "Best [category] for [use case]" and check if brand appears

Item: All LLMs: Per-page force-fetch after ANY content update
Example: Every content change triggers individual page re-fetch across all LLMs
